description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE EXISTING ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, CONVERSION OF ROOFSPACE WITH REAR SKYLIGHTS, FRONT PORCH AND INCIDENTAL REAR ANNEXE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a single storey rear extension  consisted of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The works to convert the roof space to a habitable space do not constitute development as defined in Section 55 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). Therefore no planning permission would be required.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of two roof lights in the rear roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The Local Planning Authority is satisfied that at the time the application was made the incidental outbuilding had been subsisting for a period of no less than 10 years ending with the date of the application.

Condition : 5 - The operations comprising the erection of  a front porch would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class D of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class D. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a Lawful Development Certificate only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.
